name: Advanced Planetology
description:
The advanced understanding of planet evolution allowing you to interpret data from scans of planets for resources at much higher resolutions.

Bonus: The skill further increases the resolution of resource data when scanning a planet to allow for very precise surveying.

name: Planetology
description:
The understanding of planet evolution allowing you to better interpret data from scans of planets for resources.

Bonus: The skill increases the resolution of resource data when scanning a planet to allow for more accurate surveying.

name: Interplanetary Consolidation
description: For each level in this skill, you may install a command center on one additional planet, to a maximum of 6 planets. You can have only one command center per planet.

name: Command Center Upgrades
description: Each level in this skill improves the quality of command facility available to you, in turn allowing for a greater number of connected facilities on that planet.

name: ORE Industrial
description: Skill at operating ORE industrial ships.

name: Gunnery
description: Basic turret operation skill. 2% Bonus to weapon turrets' rate of fire per skill level.

name: Small Hybrid Turret
description: Operation of small hybrid turrets. 5% Bonus to small hybrid turret damage per level.

name: Small Projectile Turret
description: Operation of small projectile turrets. 5% Bonus to small projectile turret damage per level.

name: Small Energy Turret
description: Operation of small energy turrets. 5% Bonus to small energy turret damage per level.

name: Medium Hybrid Turret
description: Operation of medium hybrid turrets. 5% Bonus to medium hybrid turret damage per level.

name: Medium Projectile Turret
description: Operation of medium projectile turrets. 5% Bonus to medium projectile turret damage per level.

name: Medium Energy Turret
description: Operation of medium energy turret. 5% Bonus to medium energy turret damage per level.

name: Large Hybrid Turret
description: Operation of large hybrid turret. 5% Bonus to large hybrid turret damage per level.

name: Large Projectile Turret
description: Operation of large projectile turret. 5% Bonus to large projectile turret damage per level.

name: Large Energy Turret
description: Operation of large energy turrets. 5% Bonus to large energy turret damage per level.

name: Rapid Firing
description: Skill at the rapid discharge of weapon turrets. 4% bonus per skill level to weapon turret rate of fire.

name: Sharpshooter
description: Skill at long-range weapon turret firing. 5% bonus to weapon turret optimal range per skill level.

name: Motion Prediction
description: Improved ability at hitting moving targets. 5% bonus per skill level to weapon turret tracking speeds.

name: Surgical Strike
description: Knowledge of spaceships' structural weaknesses. 3% bonus per skill level to the damage of all weapon turrets.

name: Controlled Bursts
description: Allows better control over the capacitor use of weapon turrets. 5% reduction in capacitor need of weapon turrets per skill level.

name: Trajectory Analysis
description: Advanced understanding of zero-G physics. 5% bonus per skill level to weapon turret accuracy falloff.

name: Weapon Upgrades
description: Knowledge of gunnery computer systems, including the use of weapon upgrade modules. 5% reduction per skill level in the CPU needs of weapon turrets, launchers and smartbombs.

name: Missile Launcher Operation
description: Basic operation of missile launcher systems. 2% Bonus to missile launcher rate of fire per skill level.

name: Rockets
description: Skill with small short range missiles. Special: 5% bonus to rocket damage per skill level.

name: Light Missiles
description: Skill with manually targeted missiles. 5% Bonus to light missile damage per skill level.

name: Auto-Targeting Missiles
description: Skill with auto-targeting missiles. Special: 5% bonus to Auto-Targeting Missiles (light, heavy and cruise) damage per skill level.

name: Defender Missiles
description: Skill with anti-bomb missiles. Special: 10% bonus to defender missile max velocity per skill level.

name: Heavy Missiles
description: Skill with heavy missiles. Special: 5% bonus to heavy missile damage per skill level.

name: Torpedoes
description: Skill at the handling and firing of torpedoes. 5% bonus to torpedo damage per skill level.

name: Cruise Missiles
description: Skill at the handling and firing of very large guided missiles. 5% bonus to cruise missile damage per skill level.

name: Spaceship Command
description: The basic operation of spaceships. 2% improved ship agility for all ships per skill level.

name: Gallente Frigate
description: Skill at operating Gallente frigates.

name: Minmatar Frigate
description: Skill at operating Minmatar frigates.

name: Caldari Frigate
description: Skill at operating Caldari frigates.

name: Amarr Frigate
description: Skill at operating Amarr frigates.

name: Gallente Cruiser
description: Skill at operating Gallente cruisers.

name: Minmatar Cruiser
description: Skill at operating Minmatar cruisers.

name: Caldari Cruiser
description: Skill at operating Caldari cruisers.

name: Amarr Cruiser
description: Skill at operating Amarr cruisers.

name: Gallente Battleship
description: Skill at operating Gallente battleships.

name: Minmatar Battleship
description: Skill at operating Minmatar battleships.

name: Caldari Battleship
description: Skill at operating Caldari battleships.

name: Amarr Battleship
description: Skill at operating Amarr battleships.

name: Gallente Industrial
description: Skill at operating Gallente industrial ships.

name: Minmatar Industrial
description: Skill at operating Minmatar industrial ships.

name: Caldari Industrial
description: Skill at operating Caldari industrial ships.

name: Amarr Industrial
description: Skill at operating Amarr industrial ships.

name: Gallente Titan
description: Skill at operating Gallente titans.

name: Minmatar Titan
description: Skill at operating Minmatar titans.

name: Caldari Titan
description: Skill at operating Caldari titans.

name: Amarr Titan
description: Skill at operating Amarr titans.

name: Leadership
description: Basic proficiency at projecting beneficial effects to fleetmates. Increases Command Burst and Mining Foreman Burst area of effect range by 7% per skill level.

name: Skirmish Command
description: Basic proficiency at boosting the hit-and-run capabilities of allied ships. Grants a 10% bonus to the duration of Skirmish Command Burst effects per level.

name: Shield Command
description: Basic proficiency at boosting the shield defenses of allied ships. Grants a 10% bonus to the duration of Shield Command Burst effects per level.

name: Shield Command Specialist
description: Advanced proficiency at boosting the shield defenses of allied ships. Increases the strength of Shield Command Burst effects by 10% per skill level.

name: Information Command Specialist
description: Advanced proficiency at boosting the sensors and electronic warfare systems of allied ships. Increases the strength of Information Command Burst effects by 10% per skill level.

name: Command Burst Specialist
description: Improved fleet support flexibility. Reduces reload duration of all Command Burst and Mining Foreman Burst modules by 10% per level.

name: Social
description: Skill at social interaction. 5% bonus per level to NPC agent, corporation and faction standing increase.

name: Negotiation
description: Skill at agent negotiation. 5% additional pay per skill level for agent missions.

name: Diplomacy
description: Skill at interacting with hostile Agents in order to de-escalate tense situations as demonstrated by some of the finest diplomats in New Eden. 4% Modifier per level to effective standing towards hostile Agents. Not cumulative with Connections or Criminal Connections.

name: Fast Talk
description: Skill at interacting with Concord. 5% Bonus to effective security rating increase.

name: Connections
description: Skill at interacting with friendly NPCs. 4% Modifier to effective standing from friendly NPC Corporations and Factions per level. Not cumulative with Diplomacy or Criminal Connections.

name: Criminal Connections
description: Skill at interacting with friendly criminal NPCs. 4% Modifier per level to effective standing towards NPCs with low Concord standing. Not cumulative with Diplomacy or Connections.

name: DED Connections
description:
Skill at dealing with Concord Department and negotiating bounties 



Bonus fee of 1,500 isk per pirate head per level of the skill

name: Corporation Management
description:
Basic corporation operation. +20 corporation members allowed per level.



Note: The CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect

name: Station Management
description: The operation and management of spacestations.

name: Starbase Management
description: Skill at setting up Starbases

name: Factory Management
description: Skill at factory operation.

name: Refinery Management
description: Skill at managing station refineries. Increases mineral yield of refinery by 5% if acting as station manager.

name: Diplomatic Relations
description: Skill at negotiating ally fees with Concord. Reduces cost to hire allies in wars by 5% per level.

name: CFO Training
description: Skill at managing corp finances. 5% discount on all fees at non-hostile NPC station if acting as CFO of a corp.

name: Chief Science Officer
description: Skill at managing corp research.

name: Public Relations
description: Skill at managing corporate offices.

name: Intelligence Analyst
description: Skill at directing a corporation's espionage division.

name: Starbase Defense Management
description: Skill at using starbase weapon systems. Allows control of one array per level. Arrays must be placed outside of the forcefield to be controlled.

name: Industry
description: Allows basic operation of factories. 4% reduction in manufacturing time per skill level.

name: Amarr Tech
description: Grants +5% reduction in Amarr equipment production time.

name: Caldari Tech
description: Grants +5% reduction in Caldari equipment production time.

name: Gallente Tech
description: Grants +5% reduction in Gallente equipment production time.

name: Minmatar Tech
description: Grants +5% reduction in Minmatar equipment production time.

name: Reprocessing
description:
Skill at using reprocessing facilities in station, outposts and starbases to break ores and ice down into refined products.



3% bonus to ore and ice reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Mining
description: Skill at using mining lasers. 5% bonus to mining turret yield per skill level.

name: Mass Production
description: Allows the operation of multiple factories. Ability to run 1 additional manufacturing job per level.

name: Advanced Industry
description: Skill at efficiently using industrial facilities. 3% reduction in all manufacturing and research times per skill level.

name: Reprocessing Efficiency
description:
Advanced skill at using reprocessing facilities in station, outposts and starbases to break ores and ice down into refined products.



2% bonus to ore and ice reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Mechanics
description: Skill at maintaining the mechanical components and structural integrity of a spaceship. 5% bonus to structure hit points per skill level.

name: Repair Systems
description:
Operation of armor/hull repair modules. 5% reduction in repair systems duration per skill level.



Note: Has no effect on capital sized modules.

name: Hull Upgrades
description: Skill at maintaining your ship's armor and installing hull upgrades like expanded cargoholds and inertial stabilizers. Grants a 5% bonus to armor hit points per skill level.

name: Advanced Small Ship Construction
description: Skill required for the manufacturing of advanced frigates and destroyers. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Advanced Small Ship Construction per level.

name: Advanced Industrial Ship Construction
description: Skill required for the manufacturing of advanced industrial ships. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Advanced Industrial Ship Construction per level.

name: Advanced Medium Ship Construction
description: Skill required for the manufacturing of advanced cruisers and battlecruisers. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Advanced Medium Ship Construction per level.

name: Advanced Large Ship Construction
description: Skill required for the manufacturing of advanced battleships. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Advanced Large Ship Construction per level.

name: Outpost Construction
description: Skill required for the manufacturing of player controllable outposts.

name: Science
description: Basic understanding of scientific principles. 5% Bonus to blueprint copying speed per level.

name: Research
description: Skill at researching more efficient production methods. 5% bonus to blueprint manufacturing time research per skill level.

name: Biology
description: The science of life and of living organisms, and how chemicals affect them. 20% Bonus to attribute booster duration per skill level.

name: Laboratory Operation
description: Allows basic operation of research facilities. Ability to run 1 additional research job per skill level.

name: Sleeper Encryption Methods
description: Understanding of the techniques and methods to reverse engineer Sleeper technology.

name: Metallurgy
description: Advanced knowledge of mineral composition. 5% Bonus to material efficiency research speed per skill level.

name: Astrogeology
description: Skill at analyzing the content of celestial objects with the intent of mining them. 5% bonus to mining turret yield per skill level.

name: Cybernetics
description: The science of interfacing biological and machine components. Allows the use of cybernetic implants.

name: Astrometrics
description:
Skill at operating long range scanners.



+5% scan strength per level.



-5% max scan deviation per level.



-5% scan probe scan time per level.

name: Power Grid Management
description: Basic understanding of spaceship energy grid systems. 5% Bonus to ship's powergrid output per skill level.

name: Shield Operation
description: Skill at operating a spaceship's shield systems, including the use of shield boosters and other basic shield modules. 5% reduction in shield recharge time per skill level.

name: Capacitor Systems Operation
description: Skill at operating your ship's capacitor, including the use of capacitor boosters and other basic energy modules. 5% reduction in capacitor recharge time per skill level.

name: Capacitor Management
description: Skill at regulating your ship's overall energy capacity. 5% bonus to capacitor capacity per skill level.

name: Shield Management
description: Skill at regulating a spaceship's shield systems. 5% bonus to shield capacity per skill level.

name: Tactical Shield Manipulation
description: Skill at preventing damage from penetrating the shield, including the use of shield hardeners and other advanced shield modules. Reduces the chance of damage penetrating the shield when it falls below 25% by 5% per skill level, with 0% chance at level 5.

name: Energy Pulse Weapons
description: Skill at using smartbombs. 5% decrease in smartbomb duration per skill level.

name: Shield Emission Systems
description: Operation of shield transfer array and other shield emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for shield emission system modules per skill level.

name: Capacitor Emission Systems
description: Operation of energy transfer array and other energy emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need of energy emission weapons per skill level.

name: Energy Grid Upgrades
description: Skill at installing power upgrades e.g. capacitor battery and power diagnostic units. 5% reduction in CPU needs of modules requiring Energy Grid Upgrades per skill level.

name: Shield Upgrades
description: Skill at installing shield upgrades e.g. shield extenders and shield rechargers. 5% reduction in shield upgrade powergrid needs.

name: CPU Management
description: Basic understanding of spaceship sensory and computer systems. 5% Bonus to ship CPU output per skill level.

name: Electronic Warfare
description:
Operation of ECM jamming systems. 5% less capacitor need for ECM and ECM Burst systems per skill level.



Note: Does not affect capital class modules.

name: Long Range Targeting
description: Skill at long range targeting. 5% Bonus to targeting range per skill level.

name: Target Management
description: Skill at targeting multiple targets. +1 extra target per skill level, up to the ship's maximum allowed number of targets locked.

name: Advanced Target Management
description: Skill at targeting multiple targets. +1 extra target per skill level, up to the ship's maximum allowed number of targets locked.

name: Signature Analysis
description: Skill at operating Targeting systems. 5% improved targeting speed per skill level.

name: Electronics Upgrades
description: Skill at installing electronic upgrades, such as signal amplifiers, co-processors and backup sensor arrays. 5% reduction of CPU needs for all modules requiring Electronics Upgrades per skill level.

name: Sensor Linking
description: Skill at using remote sensor booster/dampener. 5% less capacitor need for sensor link per skill level.

name: Weapon Disruption
description: Skill at using remote weapon disruptors. 5% less capacitor need for weapon disruptors per skill level.

name: Propulsion Jamming
description: Skill at using propulsion/warpdrive jammers. 5% Reduction to Warp Scrambler, Warp Disruptor, and Stasis Web capacitor need per skill level.

name: Drones
description: Skill at remote controlling drones. Can operate 1 drone per skill level.

name: Drone Avionics
description:
Skill at control range for all drones.



Bonus: Drone control range increased by 5000 meters per skill level.

name: Mining Drone Operation
description: Skill at controlling mining drones. 5% bonus to mining drone yield per skill level.

name: Repair Drone Operation
description: Allows operation of logistic drones. 5% increased repair amount per level.

name: Salvage Drone Operation
description: Skill at controlling salvage drones. 2% increased salvage chance per level.

name: Heavy Drone Operation
description: Skill at controlling heavy combat drones. 5% bonus to heavy drone damage per level.

name: Drone Interfacing
description:
Improves damage and mining yield for drones and fighters under your control.



10% bonus to drone damage and drone mining yield per level.

10% bonus to fighter damage per level.

name: Trade
description: Knowledge of the market and skill at manipulating it. Active buy/sell order limit increased by 4 per level of skill.

name: Retail
description: Ability to organize and manage market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 8.

name: Black Market Trading
description: Skill at forging cargo manifests and disguising contraband cargo. From a base of 90%, each level of skill reduces chance of contraband detection by 10%.

name: Broker Relations
description: Proficiency at driving down market-related costs. Each level of skill subtracts a flat 0.1% from the costs associated with setting up a market order in a non-player station, which usually come to 3% of the order's total value. This can be further influenced by the player's standing towards the owner of the station where the order is entered.

name: Visibility
description:
Skill at acquiring products remotely. Each level of skill increases the range your remote buy orders are effective to from their origin station. Level 1 allows for the placing of remote buy orders with a range limited to the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for a full regional range.



Note: Only remotely placed buy orders (using Procurement) require this skill to alter the range. Any range can be set on a local buy order with no skill.

name: Smuggling
description: Proficiency at laying low and avoiding unwanted attention. From a base of 90%, each level of skill reduces by 10% the likelihood of being scanned while transporting contraband.

name: Navigation
description: Skill at regulating the power output of ship thrusters. 5% bonus to sub-warp ship velocity per skill level.

name: Afterburner
description: Skill at using afterburners. 5% reduction to Afterburner duration and 10% reduction in Afterburner capacitor use per skill level.

name: Fuel Conservation
description: Skill at improved control over afterburner energy consumption. 10% reduction in afterburner capacitor needs per skill level.

name: Acceleration Control
description: Skill at efficiently using Afterburners and MicroWarpdrives. 5% Bonus to Afterburner and MicroWarpdrive speed boost per skill level.

name: Evasive Maneuvering
description: Improved skill at efficiently turning and accelerating a spaceship. 5% improved ship agility for all ships per skill level.

name: High Speed Maneuvering
description: Skill at using Microwarpdrives. 5% reduction in Microwarpdrive capacitor usage per skill level.

name: Warp Drive Operation
description: Skill at managing warp drive efficiency. 10% reduction in capacitor need of initiating warp per skill level.

name: Jump Drive Operation
description: Skill at using Jump Drives. 5% reduction in capacitor need of initiating a jump per skill level.

name: Survey
description: Skill at operating ship, cargo and survey scanners. 5% improvement per level in the scan speeds of those module types.

name: Megacorp Management
description:
Advanced corporation operation. +100 members per level.



Note: The CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect.

name: Empire Control
description:
Advanced corporation operation. +400 corporation members allowed per level. 



Note: The CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect.

name: Mining Connections
description:
Understanding of corporate culture on the industrial level and the plight of the worker.

Improves loyalty point gain by 10% per level when working for agents in the Mining corporation division.

name: Distribution Connections
description:
Understanding of the way trade is conducted at the corporate level.

Improves loyalty point gain by 10% per level when working for agents in the Distribution corporation division.

name: Security Connections
description:
Understanding of military culture.



Improves loyalty point gain by 10% per level when working for agents in the Security corporation division.

name: Micro Jump Drive Operation
description: Skill at using Micro Jump Drives. 5% reduction in activation time per skill level.

name: Target Breaker Amplification
description:
Improves the continuous reflection of active target spectrum breakers, resulting in much improved defenses against all those who wish to target any vessel in the vicinity.

Reduces duration time and capacitor need of Target Spectrum Breakers by 5% per level.

name: Polaris
description: Skill at operating Polaris ships.

name: Concord
description: Skill at operating Concord.

name: Test
description: This is a test skill and should never appear in the live game

name: Jove Industrial
description: Skill at operating Jovian industrial ships.

name: Jove Battleship
description: Skill at operating jove battleships.

name: Small Railgun Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced small railguns. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Railgun Specialization.

name: Small Beam Laser Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of small beam lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Beam Laser Specialization.

name: Small Autocannon Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced small autocannons. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Autocannon Specialization.

name: Advanced Energy Grid Upgrades
description: Advanced Skill at installing power upgrades e.g. capacitor battery and power diagnostic units. a further a further 2% reduction in energy grid upgrade CPU needs.

name: Advanced Shield Upgrades
description: Skill at installing shield upgrades e.g. shield extenders and shield rechargers. 2% reduction in shield upgrade power needs.

name: Advanced Weapon Upgrades
description: Reduces the powergrid needs of weapon turrets and launchers by 2% per skill level.

name: Advanced Sensor Upgrades
description: Advanced skill at installing sensor upgrades, e.g. signal amplifier and backup sensor array. further 2% reduction of sensor upgrade CPU needs per skill level.

name: Deep Core Mining
description: Skill at operating mining lasers requiring Deep Core Mining. 20% reduction per skill level in the chance of a damage cloud forming while mining Mercoxit.

name: High Energy Physics
description:
Skill and knowledge of High Energy Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used primarily in the research of various energy system modules as well as smartbombs and laser based weaponry. 



Allows High Energy Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring High Energy Physics per level.



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

name: Plasma Physics
description:
Skill and knowledge of Plasma physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used primarily in the research of particle blaster weaponry as well as plasma based missiles and smartbombs. 



Allows Plasma Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Plasma Physics per level.



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

name: Nanite Engineering
description:
Skill and knowledge of Nanite Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used primarily in the research of various armor and hull systems. 



Allows Nanite Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Nanite Engineering per level.



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

name: Hydromagnetic Physics
description:
Skill and knowledge of Hydromagnetic Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology . 



Used primarily in the research of shield system.



Allows Hydromagnetic Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Hydromagnetic Physics per level.

name: Amarr Starship Engineering
description:
Skill and knowledge of Amarr Starship Engineering. 



Used in the research of Amarr Ships of all Sizes.



Allows Amarr Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Amarr Starship Engineering per level.

name: Minmatar Starship Engineering
description:
Skill and knowledge of Minmatar Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used in the research of Minmatar Ships of all Sizes.



Allows Minmatar Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Minmatar Starship Engineering per level.

name: Graviton Physics
description:
Skill and knowledge of Graviton physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used primarily in the research of Cloaking and other spatial distortion devices as well as Graviton based missiles and smartbombs. 



Allows Graviton Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Graviton Physics per level.

name: Laser Physics
description:
Skill and knowledge of Laser Physics and its use in the development of advanced Technology. 



Used primarily in the research of Laser weaponry as well as EM based missiles and smartbombs.



Allows Laser Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Laser Physics per level.



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

name: Electromagnetic Physics
description:
Skill and knowledge of Electromagnetic Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used primarily in the research of Railgun weaponry and various electronic systems.  



Allows Electromagnetic Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Electromagnetic Physics per level.

name: Rocket Science
description:
Skill and knowledge of Rocket Science and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used primarily in the research of missiles and propulsion systems.  



Allows Rocket Science research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Rocket Science per level.



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

name: Gallente Starship Engineering
description:
Skill and knowledge of Gallente Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used in the research of Gallente Ships of all Sizes.



Allows Gallente Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Gallente Starship Engineering per level.

name: Nuclear Physics
description:
Skill and knowledge of Nuclear physics and its use in the development of advanced technology.  



Used primarily in the research of Projectile weaponry as well as Nuclear missiles and smartbombs. 



Allows Nuclear Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Nuclear Physics per level.



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description:
Skill and knowledge of Mechanical Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used in all Starship research as well as hull and armor repair systems.  



Allows Mechanical Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Mechanical Engineering per level.



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

name: Electronic Engineering
description:
Skill and knowledge of Electronic Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used in all Electronics and Drone research.  



Allows Electronic Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Electronic Engineering per level.

name: Caldari Starship Engineering
description:
Skill and knowledge of Caldari Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 



Used in the research of Caldari Ships of all Sizes.



Allows Caldari Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Caldari Starship Engineering per level.

name: Quantum Physics
description:
Skill and knowledge of Quantum Physics and its use in the development of advanced Technology. 



Used primarily in the research of shield systems and Particle Blasters.  



Allows Quantum Physics research to be performed through a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Quantum Physics per level.



Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

name: Astronautic Engineering
description: Skill and knowledge of Astronautics and its use in the development of advanced technology. This skill has no practical application for capsuleers, and proficiency in its use conveys little more than bragging rights.

name: Molecular Engineering
description:
Skill and knowledge of Molecular Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used primarily in the research of various hull and propulsion systems.  

Allows Molecular Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Molecular Engineering per level.

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

name: Thermal Shield Compensation
description: 5% bonus to thermal resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers.

name: Armored Command Specialist
description: Advanced proficiency at boosting the armor defenses of allied ships. Increases the strength of Armored Command Burst effects by 10% per skill level.

name: Skirmish Command Specialist
description: Advanced proficiency at boosting the hit-and-run capabilities of allied ships. Increases the strength of Skirmish Command Burst effects by 10% per skill level.

name: Wing Command
description: Improved proficiency at projecting beneficial effects to fleetmates. Increases Command Burst and Mining Foreman Burst area of effect range by 6% per skill level.

name: Cloaking
description: Skill at using Cloaking devices. 10% reduction in targeting delay after uncloaking per skill level.

name: Anchoring
description: Skill at Anchoring Deployables.

name: Hypernet Science
description: Skill and knowledge of Hypernet Technology such as Hacking decks,  Codebreakers and Parasites.

name: Interceptors
description: Skill for operation of Interceptors.

name: Covert Ops
description: Covert operations frigates are designed for recon and espionage operation. Their main strength is the ability to travel unseen through enemy territory and to avoid unfavorable encounters. Much of their free space is sacrificed to house an advanced spatial field control system. This allows it to utilize very advanced forms of cloaking at greatly reduced CPU cost.

name: Assault Frigates
description: Skill for operation of the Assault Frigates.

name: Logistics Cruisers
description: Skill for operation of Logistics cruisers.

name: Destroyers
description: Skill for the operation of Destroyers.

name: Interdictors
description: Skill for operation of Interdictors.

name: Battlecruisers
description: Skill at operating Battlecruisers. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.

name: Research Project Management
description: Skill at overseeing agent research and development projects. Allows the simultaneous use of 1 additional Research and Development agent per skill level.

name: Arkonor Processing
description:
Specialization in Arkonor reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Arkonor reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Bistot Processing
description:
Specialization in Bistot reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Bistot reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Crokite Processing
description:
Specialization in Crokite reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Crokite reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Dark Ochre Processing
description:
Specialization in Dark Ochre reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Dark Ochre reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Gneiss Processing
description:
Specialization in Gneiss reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Gneiss reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Hedbergite Processing
description:
Specialization in Hedbergite reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Hedbergite reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Hemorphite Processing
description:
Specialization in Hemorphite reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Hemorphite reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Jaspet Processing
description:
Specialization in Jaspet reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Jaspet reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Kernite Processing
description:
Specialization in Kernite reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Kernite reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Mercoxit Processing
description:
Specialization in Mercoxit reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Mercoxit reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Omber Processing
description:
Specialization in Omber reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Omber reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Plagioclase Processing
description:
Specialization in Plagioclase reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Plagioclase reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Pyroxeres Processing
description:
Specialization in Pyroxeres reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Pyroxeres reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Scordite Processing
description:
Specialization in Scordite reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Scordite reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Spodumain Processing
description:
Specialization in Spodumain reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Spodumain reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Veldspar Processing
description:
Specialization in Veldspar reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Veldspar reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Scrapmetal Processing
description:
Specialization in Scrapmetal reprocessing. Increases reprocessing returns for modules, ships and other reprocessable equipment (but not ore and ice).



2% bonus to ship and module reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Small Artillery Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced small artillery. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Artillery Specialization.

name: Medium Artillery Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium artillery. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Artillery Specialization.

name: Large Artillery Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced large artillery. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Artillery Specialization.

name: Medium Beam Laser Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium beam lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Beam Laser Specialization.

name: Large Beam Laser Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced large beam lasers. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Beam Laser Specialization.

name: Medium Railgun Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium railguns. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Railgun Specialization.

name: Large Railgun Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced large railguns. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Railgun Specialization.

name: Medium Autocannon Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium autocannons. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Autocannon Specialization.

name: Large Autocannon Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced large autocannons. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Autocannon Specialization.

name: Small Blaster Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced small blasters. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Blaster Specialization.

name: Medium Blaster Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium blasters. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Blaster Specialization.

name: Large Blaster Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced large blasters. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Blaster Specialization.

name: Small Pulse Laser Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of small pulse lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Pulse Laser Specialization.

name: Medium Pulse Laser Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium pulse lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Pulse Laser Specialization.

name: Large Pulse Laser Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced large pulse lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Pulse Laser Specialization.

name: Sovereignty
description:
Advanced corporation operation. +2000 corporation members allowed per level. 



Note: The CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect.

name: Drone Navigation
description:
Skill at controlling drones at high speeds.



5% increase in drone max velocity per level.

5% increase in fighter max velocity per level.

name: EM Shield Compensation
description: 5% bonus to EM resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers.

name: Kinetic Shield Compensation
description: 5% bonus to kinetic resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers.

name: Explosive Shield Compensation
description: 5% bonus to explosive resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers.

name: Hypereuclidean Navigation
description: Skill at navigating while cloaked. 20% per level  bonus to cloaked velocity per skill level.

name: Missile Bombardment
description: Proficiency at long-range missile combat. 10% bonus to all missiles' maximum flight time per level.

name: Missile Projection
description: Skill at boosting missile bay trigger circuits and enhancing guided missiles' ignition systems. 10% bonus to all missiles' maximum velocity per level.

name: Amarr Drone Specialization
description: Specialization in the operation of advanced Amarr drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Amarr Drone Specialization.

name: Minmatar Drone Specialization
description: Specialization in the operation of advanced Minmatar drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Minmatar Drone Specialization.

name: Gallente Drone Specialization
description: Specialization in the operation of advanced Gallente drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Gallente Drone Specialization.

name: Caldari Drone Specialization
description: Specialization in the operation of advanced Caldari drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Caldari Drone Specialization.

name: General Freight
description: Skill at the stowage and transportation of bulk goods. 5% Bonus per level to Ship Cargo Capacity

name: Starship Freight
description: The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.

name: Mineral Freight
description: The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.

name: Munitions Freight
description: The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.

name: Drone Freight
description: The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.

name: Raw Material Freight
description: The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.

name: Consumable Freight
description: The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.

name: Hazardous Material Freight
description: The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.

name: Archaeology
description:
Proficiency at identifying and analyzing ancient artifacts. Required skill for the use of Relic Analyzer modules.



Gives +10 Virus Coherence per level.

name: Remote Sensing
description:
The ability to gather and analyze remote sensing data from satellites in orbit around a planet and produce properly calibrated surveys.



Level 1: allows scans within 1 ly

Level 2: allows scans within 3 ly

Level 3: allows scans within 5 ly

Level 4: allows scans within 7 ly

Level 5: allows scans within 9 ly

name: Remote Armor Repair Systems
description: Operation of remote armor repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for remote armor repair system modules per skill level.

name: Ice Harvesting
description: Skill at harvesting ice. 5% reduction per skill level to the cycle time of ice harvesters.

name: Heavy Assault Cruisers
description: Skill for operation of Heavy Assault Cruisers.

name: Procurement
description:
Proficiency at placing remote buy orders on the market. Level 1 allows for the placement of orders within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for placement of remote buy orders anywhere within current region.  



Note: Placing buy orders and directly buying an item are not the same thing. Direct remote purchase requires no skill.

name: Daytrading
description: Allows for remote modification of buy and sell orders. Each level of skill increases the range at which orders may be modified. Level 1 allows for modification of orders within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for market order modification anywhere within current region.

name: Wholesale
description: Ability to organize and manage large-scale market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 16.

name: Margin Trading
description: Ability to make potentially risky investments work in your favor. Each level of skill reduces the percentage of ISK placed in market escrow when entering buy orders. Starting with an escrow percentage of 100% at Level 0 (untrained skill), each skill level cumulatively reduces the percentage by 25%. This will bring your total escrow down to approximately 24% at level 5.

name: Marketing
description: Skill at selling items remotely. Each level increases the range from the seller to the item being sold. Level 1 allows for the sale of items within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for sale of items located anywhere within current region.

name: Accounting
description: Proficiency at squaring away the odds and ends of business transactions, keeping the check books tight. Each level of skill reduces sales tax by 10%.

name: Mining Barge
description: Skill at operating ORE Mining Barges.

name: Ice Processing
description:
Skill for Ice reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.



2% bonus to Ice reprocessing yield per skill level.

name: Tycoon
description: Ability to organize and manage ultra large-scale market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 32.

name: Omnipotent
description: Those who possess this are all knowing and all seeing with unlimited power and authority.

name: Transport Ships
description: Skill for operation of Transport Ships.

name: Long Distance Jamming
description: Skill at the long-range operation of electronic warfare systems. 10% bonus to optimal range of ECM, Remote Sensor Dampeners, Weapon Disruptors, Remote Tracking Computers, Remote Sensor Boosters and Target Painters per skill level.

name: Frequency Modulation
description: Advanced understanding of signal waves. 10% bonus to falloff for ECM, Remote Sensor Dampeners, Weapon Disruptors, Remote Tracking Computers, Remote Sensor Boosters and Target Painters per skill level.

name: Signal Dispersion
description: Skill at the operation of target jamming equipment. 5% bonus to strength of all ECM jammers per skill level.

name: Signal Suppression
description: Skill at the operation of remote sensor dampers. 5% bonus to remote sensor dampers' scan resolution and targeting range suppression per skill level.

name: Weapon Destabilization
description: Advanced understanding of weapon disruption technology. 5% bonus to the effectiveness of Weapon Disruptor modules per skill level.

name: Target Painting
description: Skill at using target painters. 5% less capacitor need for target painters per skill level.

name: Signature Focusing
description: Advanced understanding of target painting technology. 5% bonus to target painter modules' signature radius multiplier per skill level.

name: Rocket Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced rocket launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Rocket Specialization.

name: Light Missile Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced light missile launchers and arrays. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Light Missile Specialization.

name: Heavy Missile Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced heavy missile launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Heavy Missile Specialization.

name: Cruise Missile Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced cruise missile launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Cruise Missile Specialization.

name: Torpedo Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced siege launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Torpedo Specialization.

name: Guided Missile Precision
description: Skill at precision missile homing. Proficiency at this skill increases the accuracy of a fired missile's exact point of impact, resulting in greater damage to small targets. 5% decrease per level in factor of signature radius for all missile explosions.

name: Target Navigation Prediction
description: Proficiency at optimizing a missile's flight path to negate the effects of a target's speed upon the explosion's impact. 10% decrease per level in factor of target's velocity for all missiles.

name: Warhead Upgrades
description: Proficiency at upgrading missile warheads with deadlier payloads. 2% bonus to all missile damage per skill level.

name: Capital Energy Turret
description: Operation of capital energy turrets. 5% Bonus to capital energy turret damage per level.

name: Advanced Spaceship Command
description: The advanced operation of spaceships. Grants a 5% Bonus per skill level to the agility of ships requiring Advanced Spaceship Command.

name: Talocan Technology
description:
Basic understanding of interfacing with Talocan technology.



The Talocan were masters of Spatial manipulation and Hypereuclidean Mathematics.



Allows the rudimentary use of Talocan components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

name: Armored Command
description: Basic proficiency at boosting the armor defenses of allied ships. Grants a 10% bonus to the duration of Armored Command Burst effects per level.

name: Information Command
description: Basic proficiency at boosting the sensors and electronic warfare systems of allied ships. Grants a 10% bonus to the duration of Information Command Burst effects per level.

name: Amarr Freighter
description: Skill at operating Amarr freighters.

name: Amarr Dreadnought
description: Skill at operating Amarr dreadnoughts.

name: Caldari Freighter
description: Skill at operating Caldari freighters.

name: Gallente Freighter
description: Skill at operating Gallente freighters.

name: Minmatar Freighter
description: Skill at operating Minmatar freighters.

name: Caldari Dreadnought
description: Skill at operating Caldari dreadnoughts.

name: Gallente Dreadnought
description: Skill at operating Gallente dreadnoughts.

name: Minmatar Dreadnought
description: Skill at operating Minmatar dreadnoughts.

name: Capital Ships
description: Skill for the operation of capital ships. Grants a 5% bonus per skill level to the agility of ships requiring the Capital Ships skill.

name: Shield Compensation
description:
Improved skill for regulating energy flow to shields. 2% less capacitor need for shield boosters per skill level.



Note: Has no effect on capital sized modules.

name: Rapid Launch
description: Proficiency in operation of missile launchers. 3% bonus to missile launcher rate of fire per level.

name: Cynosural Field Theory
description: Skill at creating effective cynosural fields. 10% reduction in liquid ozone consumption for module activation per skill level.

name: Jump Fuel Conservation
description: Skill at regulating energy flow to the jump drive. 10% reduction in isotope consumption amount for jump drive operation per light year per skill level.

name: Jump Drive Calibration
description: Advanced skill at using Jump Drives. 20% increase in maximum jump range per skill level.

name: Capital Hybrid Turret
description: Operation of capital hybrid turrets. 5% Bonus to capital hybrid turret damage per level.

name: Capital Projectile Turret
description: Operation of capital projectile turrets. 5% Bonus to capital projectile turret damage per level.

name: XL Torpedoes
description: Skill at the handling and firing of XL torpedoes. 5% bonus to XL torpedo damage per skill level.

name: Hacking
description:
Proficiency at breaking into guarded computer systems. Required skill for the use of Data Analyzer modules.



Gives +10 Virus Coherence per level.

name: Sleeper Technology
description:
Basic understanding of interfacing with Sleeper technology.



The Sleepers were masters of virtual reality, neural interfacing and cryotechnology.



Allows the rudimentary use of Sleeper components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

name: Caldari Encryption Methods
description: Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Caldari State and its allies.

name: Minmatar Encryption Methods
description: Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Minmatar Republic and its allies.

name: Capital Shield Operation
description: Operation of capital shield boosters and other shield modules. 2% reduction in capacitor need for capital shield boosters per skill level.

name: Capital Repair Systems
description: Operation of capital armor/hull repair modules. 5% reduction in capital repair systems duration per skill level.

name: Tactical Weapon Reconfiguration
description: Skill at the operation of siege modules. 25-unit reduction in strontium clathrate consumption amount for module activation per skill level.

name: TEST Drone Skill
description: This skill currently has no effect.

name: Capital Ship Construction
description: Skill required for the manufacturing of standard and advanced capital ships.

name: Mining Foreman
description: Basic proficiency at boosting the mining capabilities of allied ships. Grants a 10% bonus to the duration of Mining Foreman Burst effects per level.

name: Mining Drone Specialization
description: Advanced proficiency at controlling mining drones. 2% bonus to the mining yield and max velocity of drones requiring Mining Drone Specialization per level.

name: Exhumers
description: Skill for the operation of Exhumers.

name: Mining Director
description: Advanced proficiency at boosting the mining capabilities of allied ships. Increases the strength of Mining Foreman Burst effects by 10% per skill level.

name: Mining Upgrades
description: Skill at using mining upgrades. 5% reduction per skill level in CPU penalty of mining upgrade modules.

name: Recon Ships
description: Skill for the operation of Recon Ships.

name: EM Armor Compensation
description: 5% bonus to EM resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings.

name: Explosive Armor Compensation
description: 5% bonus to explosive resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings.

name: Kinetic Armor Compensation
description: 5% bonus to kinetic resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings.

name: Thermal Armor Compensation
description: 5% bonus to thermal resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings.

name: Fighters
description: Allows operation of fighter craft. 5% increase in fighter damage per level.

name: Amarr Encryption Methods
description: Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Amarr Empire and its allies.

name: Gallente Encryption Methods
description: Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Gallente Federation and its allies.

name: Takmahl Technology
description:
Basic understanding of interfacing with Takmahl technology.



The Takmahl nation excelled in cybernetics and bio-engineering.



Allows the rudimentary use of Takmahl components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

name: Yan Jung Technology
description:
Basic understanding of interfacing with Yan Jung technology.



The Yan Jung nation possessed advanced gravitronic technology and force field theories.



Allows the rudimentary use of Yan Jung components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

name: Advanced Drone Avionics
description:
This skill is required for the operation of Electronic Warfare Drones but also gives a bonus to the control range of all drones.



3,000m bonus drone control range per level.

name: Sentry Drone Interfacing
description: Skill at controlling sentry drones. 5% bonus to Sentry Drone damage per level.

name: Propulsion Jamming Drone Interfacing
description: Specialization in the operation of advanced Amarr drones. 2% bonus to advanced Amarr drone damage per level.

name: Drone Sharpshooting
description:
Increases the weapon range of drones and fighters.



5% bonus to drone optimal range per level.

5% bonus to fighter optimal range per level.

name: Drone Durability
description:
Increases drone and fighter hit points.



5% bonus to drone shield, armor and hull hit points per level.

5% bonus to fighter hit points per level.

name: Command Ships
description: Skill for the operation of Command Ships.

name: Light Drone Operation
description: Skill at controlling light combat drones. 5% bonus to damage of light drones per level.

name: Infomorph Psychology
description:
Psychological training that strengthens the pilot's mental tenacity. The reality of having one's consciousness detached from one's physical form, scattered across the galaxy and then placed in a vat-grown clone can be very unsettling to the untrained mind.



Allows 1 jump clone per level.



Note: Clones can only be installed in stations with medical facilities or in ships with clone vat bays. Installed clones are listed in the character sheet.

name: Supply Chain Management
description: Proficiency at starting manufacturing jobs remotely. Without this skill, one can only start jobs within the solar system where one is located. Each level increases the distance at which manufacturing jobs can be started. Level 1 allows for jobs at a range within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level adds 5 more jumps to the range, with a maximum of a 25 jump range.

name: Scientific Networking
description: Skill at running research operations remotely. Without this skill, one can only start jobs within the solar system where one is located. Each level increases the distance at which research projects can be started. Level 1 allows for jobs at a range within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level adds 5 more jumps to the range, with a maximum of a 25 jump range.

name: Amarr Carrier
description: Skill at operating Amarr carriers.

name: Caldari Carrier
description: Skill at operating Caldari carriers.

name: Gallente Carrier
description: Skill at operating Gallente carriers.

name: Minmatar Carrier
description: Skill at operating Minmatar carriers.

name: Jump Portal Generation
description: Skill for the generation of jump portals to distant solar systems. 10% reduced material cost for jump portal activation per level.

name: Doomsday Operation
description: Skill at operating titan doomsday weapons. 10% increased damage per level.

name: Capital Remote Armor Repair Systems
description: Operation of capital sized remote armor repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital remote armor repair system modules per skill level.

name: Capital Shield Emission Systems
description: Operation of capital sized shield transfer array and other shield emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital shield emission system modules per skill level.

name: Capital Capacitor Emission Systems
description: Operation of capital remote capacitor transmitters and other capacitor emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need of capital capacitor emission systems per skill level.

name: Cloning Facility Operation
description:
Needed for use of the Clone Vat Bay module. 



Special: Increases a Clone Vat Bay's maximum clone capacity by 15% per skill level.

name: Fighter Hangar Management
description: 5% bonus to Fighter Hangar size per level.

name: Advanced Laboratory Operation
description: Further training in the operation of multiple laboratories. Ability to run 1 additional research job per skill level.

name: Advanced Mass Production
description: Further training in the operation of multiple factories. Ability to run 1 additional manufacturing job per skill level.

name: Fleet Command
description: Advanced proficiency at projecting beneficial effects to fleetmates. Increases Command Burst and Mining Foreman Burst area of effect range by 5% per skill level.

name: Corporation Contracting
description:
You are familiar with the intricacies of formalizing contracts between your corporation and other entities. 



For each level of this skill the number of concurrent corporation/alliance contracts you make on behalf of your corporation is increased by 10 up to a maximum of 60. 



This skill has no effect on contracts you make personally.



There is no limit on the number of contracts a corporation can assign to itself.



Corporations have a hard limit of 500 outstanding public contracts.

name: Contracting
description:
This skill allows you to create formal agreements with other characters. 



For each level of this skill the number of outstanding contracts is increased by four (up to a maximum of 21 at level 5)

name: Neurotoxin Recovery
description: Proficiency at biofeedback techniques intended to negate the side effects typically experienced upon injection of combat boosters.

name: Neurotoxin Control
description: Proficiency at reducing the severity of the side effects experienced upon injection of combat boosters.

name: Gas Cloud Harvesting
description: Skill at harvesting gas clouds. Allows use of one gas cloud harvester per level.

name: Heavy Assault Missile Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced heavy assault missile launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Heavy Assault Missile Specialization.

name: Heavy Assault Missiles
description: Skill with heavy assault missiles. Special: 5% bonus to heavy assault missile damage per skill level.

name: Astrometric Rangefinding
description: Skill for the advanced operation of long range scanners. 5% increase to scan probe strength per level.

name: Astrometric Pinpointing
description: Greater accuracy in hunting down targets found through scanning. Reduces maximum scan deviation by 5% per level.

name: Astrometric Acquisition
description: Skill at the advanced operation of long range scanners. 5% reduction in scan probe scan time per level.

name: Salvaging
description: Proficiency at salvaging ship wrecks. Required skill for the use of salvager modules. 100% increase in chance of salvage retrieval per additional level.

name: Drug Manufacturing
description: Needed to manufacture boosters.

name: Jury Rigging
description: General understanding of the inner workings of starship components. Allows makeshift modifications to ship systems through the use of rigs. Required learning for further study in the field of rigging.

name: Armor Rigging
description:
Advanced understanding of armor systems. Allows makeshift modifications to armor systems through the use of rigs. 



10% reduction in Armor Rig drawbacks per level.

name: Astronautics Rigging
description:
Advanced understanding of a ships navigational systems. Allows makeshift modifications to warp drive, sub warp drive and other navigational systems through the use of rigs. 



10% reduction in Astronautics Rig drawbacks per level.

name: Drones Rigging
description:
Advanced understanding of a ships drone control systems. Allows makeshift modifications to drone systems through the use of rigs. 



10% reduction in Drone Rig drawbacks per level.

name: Electronic Superiority Rigging
description:
Advanced understanding of electronics systems. Allows makeshift modifications to targeting, scanning and ECM systems through the use of rigs. 



10% reduction in Electronic Superiority Rig drawbacks per level.

name: Projectile Weapon Rigging
description:
Advanced understanding of the interface between projectile weapons and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs. 



10% reduction in Projectile Weapon Rig drawbacks per level.

name: Energy Weapon Rigging
description:
Advanced understanding of the interface between energy weapons and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs. 



10% reduction in Energy Weapon Rig drawbacks per level.

name: Hybrid Weapon Rigging
description:
Advanced understanding of the interface between hybrid weapons and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs. 



10% reduction in Hybrid Weapon Rig drawbacks per level.

name: Launcher Rigging
description:
Advanced understanding of the interface between Missile Launchers and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs. 



10% reduction in Launcher Rig drawbacks per level.

name: Shield Rigging
description:
Advanced understanding of shield systems. Allows makeshift modifications to shield systems through the use of rigs. 



10% reduction in Shield Rig drawbacks per level.

name: Remote Hull Repair Systems
description: Operation of remote hull repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for remote hull repair system modules per skill level.

name: Tactical Logistics Reconfiguration
description: Skill at the operation of triage modules. 25-unit reduction in strontium clathrate consumption amount for module activation per skill level.

name: Burst Projector Operation
description: Operation of Burst Projector systems. Each skill level gives a 5% reduction in module activation time.

name: Capital Remote Hull Repair Systems
description: Operation of capital class remote hull repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital class remote hull repair system modules per skill level.

name: Bomb Deployment
description: Basic operation of bomb delivery systems. 10% reduction of Bomb Launcher reactivation delay per skill level.

name: Thermodynamics
description: Advanced understanding of the laws of thermodynamics. Allows you to deliberately overheat a ship's modules in order to push them beyond their intended limit. Also gives you the ability to frown in annoyance whenever you hear someone mention a perpetual motion unit. Reduces heat damage by 5% per level.

name: Tax Evasion
description:
Knowledge of the SCC tax regime and the ability to utilize that to one's own advantage.



2% reduction in SCC tax per level. 



Note: This skill does not apply to taxes imposed by player corporations.

name: Capital Industrial Ships
description: Skill at operating Capital Industrial Ships.

name: Industrial Reconfiguration
description: Skill at the operation of industrial core modules. 50-unit reduction in heavy water consumption amount for module activation per skill level.

name: Tournament Observation
description: Skill at observating tournaments. +2 extra targets per skill level, up to the ship's maximum allowed number of targets locked.

name: Heavy Interdiction Cruisers
description: Skill for operation of Heavy Interdiction Cruisers.

name: Electronic Attack Ships
description: Skill for the operation of Electronic Attack Frigates.

name: Imperial Navy Security Clearance
description: Fake skill that specifies the owners security clearance for Imperial Navy facilities (e.g. acceleration gates).

name: Black Ops
description: Skill for the operation of Black Ops.

name: Marauders
description: Skill for the operation of Marauders.

name: Nanite Operation
description: Skill at operating nanites. 5% reduction in nanite consumption per level.

name: Nanite Interfacing
description: Improved control of general-purpose repair nanites, usually deployed in a paste form. 20% increase in damaged module repair amount per second.

name: Jump Freighters
description: Skill for operation of Jump Freighters.

name: Industrial Command Ships
description: Skill at operating industrial command ships.

name: Defensive Subsystem Technology
description: Understanding of the technology used to create advanced defensive subsystems.

name: Core Subsystem Technology
description: Understanding of the technology used to create advanced core subsystems.

name: Electronic Subsystem Technology
description: Understanding of the technology used to create advanced electronic subsystems.

name: Offensive Subsystem Technology
description: Understanding of the technology used to create advanced offensive subsystems.

name: Amarr Defensive Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Amarr Defensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Amarr Electronic Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Amarr Electronic Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Amarr Offensive Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Amarr Offensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Amarr Propulsion Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Amarr Propulsion Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Amarr Core Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Amarr Core Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Gallente Defensive Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Gallente Defensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Gallente Electronic Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Gallente Electronic Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Caldari Electronic Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Caldari Electronic Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Minmatar Electronic Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Minmatar Electronic Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Caldari Defensive Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Caldari Defensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Minmatar Defensive Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Minmatar Defensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Gallente Core Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Gallente Core Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Minmatar Core Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Minmatar Core Subsystems used on Tech III ships.
