description: Skill in the operation of Caldari Core Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Caldari Offensive Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Caldari Offensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Gallente Offensive Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Gallente Offensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Minmatar Offensive Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Minmatar Offensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Caldari Propulsion Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Caldari Propulsion Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Gallente Propulsion Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Gallente Propulsion Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Minmatar Propulsion Systems
description: Skill in the operation of Minmatar Propulsion Subsystems used on Tech III ships.

name: Amarr Strategic Cruiser
description: Skill at operating Amarr Strategic Cruisers.

name: Caldari Strategic Cruiser
description: Skill at operating Caldari Strategic Cruisers.

name: Gallente Strategic Cruiser
description: Skill at operating Gallente Strategic Cruisers.

name: Minmatar Strategic Cruiser
description: Skill at operating Minmatar Strategic Cruisers.

name: Propulsion Subsystem Technology
description: Understanding of the technology used to create advanced propulsion subsystems.

name: Heavy Fighters
description: Allows operation of heavy fighter craft. 5% increase in heavy fighter damage per level.

name: XL Cruise Missiles
description: Skill at the handling and firing of XL Cruise Missiles. 5% bonus to XL Cruise Missile damage per skill level.

name: Resistance Phasing
description:
Improves control over, and flow between, nano membranes that react to damage by shifting resistances.



Reduces cycle time of Reactive Armor Hardeners, Flex Armor Hardeners and Flex Shield Hardeners by 10% per level and capacitor need by 15% per level.

name: Tactical Strike
description:
Skill at Tactical Strike Accuracy.



Accuracy of Tactical Strike increased by 5% per level

name: Mining Frigate
description: Skill at operating ORE Mining Frigates.

name: Magnetometric Sensor Compensation
description:
Skill at hardening Magnetometric Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Magnetometric Sensor Strength per skill level.



Magnetometric Sensors are primarily found on Gallente, Serpentis, ORE, and Sisters of EVE ships.

name: Gravimetric Sensor Compensation
description:
Skill at hardening Gravimetric Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Gravimetric Sensor Strength per skill level.



Gravimetric Sensors are primarily found on Caldari, Guristas and Mordu's Legion ships.

name: Ladar Sensor Compensation
description:
Skill at hardening Ladar Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Ladar Sensor Strength per skill level.



Ladar Sensors are primarily found on Minmatar and Angel ships.

name: Radar Sensor Compensation
description:
Skill at hardening Radar Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Radar Sensor Strength per skill level.



Radar Sensors are primarily found on Amarr, Blood Raider and Sanshas ships.

name: Armor Layering
description: Skill at installing upgraded armor plates efficiently and securely, reducing the impact they have on agility and speed. Grants a 5% reduction to armor plate mass penalty per level.

name: Amarr Destroyer
description: Skill at operating Amarr destroyers.

name: Caldari Destroyer
description: Skill at operating Caldari destroyers.

name: Gallente Destroyer
description: Skill at operating Gallente destroyers.

name: Minmatar Destroyer
description: Skill at operating Minmatar destroyers.

name: Amarr Battlecruiser
description: Skill at operating Amarr battlecruisers.

name: Caldari Battlecruiser
description: Skill at operating Caldari battlecruisers.

name: Gallente Battlecruiser
description: Skill at operating Gallente battlecruisers.

name: Minmatar Battlecruiser
description: Skill at operating Minmatar battlecruisers.

name: Infomorph Synchronizing
description:
Psychological training that strengthens the pilot's mental tenacity. Improved ability to synchronize with new clones allows pilots to jump-clone more frequently without risk of neural damage.



Reduced time between clone jumps by 1 hour per level.



Note: Clones can only be installed in stations with medical facilities or in ships with clone vat bays. Installed clones are listed in the character sheet.

name: Advanced Infomorph Psychology
description:
Advanced training for those Capsuleers who want to push clone technology to its limits.



Allows 1 additional jump clone per level.



Note: Clones can only be installed in stations with medical facilities or in ships with clone vat bays. Installed clones are listed in the character sheet.

name: Customs Code Expertise
description:
Expertise in cutting through the red tape of customs regulations. Reduces Import and Export empire tax in Customs Offices by 10% per level.



This does not affect InterBus Customs Offices.

name: Medium Drone Operation
description: Skill at controlling medium combat drones. 5% bonus to damage of medium drones per level.

name: Expedition Frigates
description: Skill for operation of Expedition Frigates.

name: ORE Freighter
description: Skill at operating ORE freighters.

name: Amarr Tactical Destroyer
description: Skill at operating Amarr Tactical Destroyers.

name: Minmatar Tactical Destroyer
description: Skill at operating Minmatar Tactical Destroyers.

name: Caldari Tactical Destroyer
description: Skill at operating Caldari Tactical Destroyers.

name: Gallente Tactical Destroyer
description: Skill at operating Gallente Tactical Destroyers.

name: Command Destroyers
description: Skill for the operation of Command Destroyers.

name: Structure Missile Systems
description:
Basic operation of structure missile launchers.



2% bonus to all structure missile and guided bomb damage per level.

name: Structure Doomsday Operation
description:
Specialization in operating Citadel doomsday weapons.



2% reduction in Arcing Vorton Projector duration per level.

name: Structure Electronic Systems
description:
Basic operation of structure electronic modules.



3% reduction in capacitor consumption of all structure electronic warfare and tackle modules per level.

name: Structure Engineering Systems
description:
Basic operation of structure engineering modules.



2% reduction in capacitor consumption of all structure energy neutralizers and point defense batteries per level.

name: Logistics Frigates
description: Skill for operation of Logistics Frigates.

name: Amarr Force Auxiliary
description: Skill at operating Amarr force auxiliaries.

name: Caldari Force Auxiliary
description: Skill at operating Caldari force auxiliaries.

name: Gallente Force Auxiliary
description: Skill at operating Gallente force auxiliaries.

name: Minmatar Force Auxiliary
description: Skill at operating Minmatar force auxiliaries.

name: Light Fighters
description: Allows operation of light fighter craft. 5% increase in light fighter velocity per level.

name: Support Fighters
description: Allows operation of support fighter craft. 5% increase in support fighter hit-points per level.

name: Capital Autocannon Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced capital autocannons. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of capital turrets requiring Capital Autocannon Specialization.

name: Capital Artillery Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced capital artillery. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of capital turrets requiring Capital Artillery Specialization.

name: Capital Blaster Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced capital blasters. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of capital turrets requiring Capital Blaster Specialization.

name: Capital Railgun Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced capital railguns. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of capital turrets requiring Capital Railgun Specialization.

name: Capital Pulse Laser Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced capital pulse lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of capital turrets requiring Capital Pulse Laser Specialization.

name: Capital Beam Laser Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced capital beam lasers. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of capital turrets requiring Capital Beam Laser Specialization.

name: XL Torpedo Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced XL torpedo launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring XL Torpedo Specialization.

name: XL Cruise Missile Specialization
description: Specialist training in the operation of advanced XL cruise missile launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring XL Cruise Missile Specialization.

name: Doomsday Rapid Firing
description: Skill at the rapid discharge of titan doomsday weapons. 4% reduction per skill level to doomsday duration.

name: Ice Harvesting Drone Operation
description: Skill at controlling ice harvesting drones. 5% reduction in ice harvesting drone cycle time per level.

name: Ice Harvesting Drone Specialization
description: Advanced proficiency at controlling ice harvesting drones. 2% reduction in cycle time and bonus to max velocity of drones requiring Ice Harvesting Drone Specialization per level.

name: Spatial Phenomena Generation
description: Proficiency in operation of Titan Phenomena Generator modules. Increases the duration of Titan Phenomena Generator effects by 10% per level.

name: Invulnerability Core Operation
description: Skill at operating the Rorqual's Pulse Activated Nexus Invulnerability Core module. 10% increase per level to the effect duration and cycle time of the Pulse Activated Nexus Invulnerability Core.

name: Reactions
description: Allows basic operation of Reaction Service Module. 4% reduction in reaction time per skill level.

name: Mass Reactions
description: Allows the operation of multiple reactions simultaneously. Ability to run 1 additional reaction job per level.

name: Advanced Mass Reactions
description: Further training in the operation of multiple reactions. Ability to run 1 additional reaction job per skill level.

name: Remote Reactions
description: Proficiency at starting reaction jobs remotely. Without this skill, one can only start jobs within the solar system where one is located. Each level increases the distance at which reaction jobs can be started. Level 1 allows for jobs at a range within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level adds 5 more jumps to the range, with a maximum of a 25 jump range.
